divs: Sighting DetailsI've had contact my whole life. I want to talk to someone I can trust. I'm willing to be questioned and even under go hypnoses, lie detector, psychological evaluation, and show physical evidence to prove my claims under the right circumstances in a safe environment. I'm 100% sure you will want to hear what I have to say. I'm not doing this for money or fame as I would like to remain anonymous. I want the world to know the truth, it's time. Contact me through my email and let me know who to call or meet.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Triangle, Other
